Events that occurred on 29 March.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien does the third and final day of his training with the top-secret Government Code and Cypher School (GCCS) at their London headquarters.
1972 - Actor Samuel Hazeldine is born.
1981 - The fourth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
2000 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 14 is published.
2012 - Author Jan Broberg dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf leaves Mirkwood for the Shire.
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
